lead_paragraph: A picture caption in some editions last Sunday with an article about the Yankees’ 8-2 victory over the Angels carried an erroneous credit. The photograph of the Yankees’ Bobby Abreu hitting a home run was by Uli Seit for The New York Times, not by Ed Betz of The Associated Press.
